        {

          "quote_text": "We are witnessing an oligarchy in America. And that is when those with the most economic, political, and technological power destroy the public good to enrich themselves while millions of Americans pay the price.",

        },
        {

        },

          "quote_text": "And that is when those with the most economic, political, and technological power destroy the public good to enrich themselves while millions of Americans pay the price.",

        },
        {

          "context_type": "direct_statement"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "hope",
          "quote_text": "But we're smarter than that Greeley. We know better than that.",

        },
        {
          "dimension": "hope",
          "quote_text": "because we know that without exception, if we stand together, it is the only way that we can win.",
          "confidence": 0.8,
          "context_type": "aspirational_statement"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "envy",
          "quote_text": "These kinds of spoils aren't earned really. They aren't working for these billions. They're stealing them. They're stealing them. They're stealing them from you and you and me.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "direct_statement"
        },
        {

          "context_type": "absence_of_evidence"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "enmity",
          "quote_text": "The same billionaires are taking a wrecking ball to our country...",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "metaphor"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "enmity",
          "quote_text": "those leaders on either side of the aisle who are willing to put their fellow Americans down, so that they can get ahead or feel better about themselves, those folks may best find a home somewhere else.",

          "context_type": "warning_and_rejection"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "amity",
          "quote_text": "We need to come together and spend every day between now and election day working to educate our neighbors, and give Evans and Boebert the boot, and replace them with a brawling Democrat who will stand for Colorado.",

          "context_type": "call_to_action"
        },
        {

          "quote_text": "In this house, we stand together, we know that, that it's our only choice because we know that without exception, if we stand together, it is the only way that we can win.",

          "context_type": "direct_statement"
        },
        {

        },

          "quote_text": "not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.",

          "quote_text": "It's another life lost to an, an illegal criminal alien who was unlawfully present in America, who had no business to be here, in the first place...",

        },
        {
          "dimension": "compassion",
          "quote_text": "I thank God for Laura Wilkerson and I ask God to bless the life and the memory and the soul of Joshua Wilkerson who has paid a tremendously high price because we have an ideological president who, I'd say to the other side of the aisle, who's not doing his job.",

        },

        },

        {
          "dimension": "tribal_dominance",
          "quote_text": "Tonight - tonight more than any night - I hold in my heart nothing but love for this country and for all its citizens, whether they supported me or Senator Obama.",

          "context_type": "rejection_of_division"
        },

          "quote_text": "This is an historic election, and I recognize the special significance it has for African-Americans and for the special pride that must be theirs tonight.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "recognition_of_historical_progress"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "individual_dignity",
          "quote_text": "Let there be no reason now for any American to fail to cherish their citizenship in this, the greatest nation on Earth.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "affirmation_of_worth"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "fear",
          "quote_text": "These are difficult times for our country, and I pledge to him tonight to do all in my power to help him lead us through the many challenges we face.",

        },
        {
          "dimension": "envy",

        },
        {

          "quote_text": "His success alone commands my respect for his ability and perseverance. But that he managed to do so by inspiring the hopes of so many millions of Americans who had once wrongly believed that they had little at stake or little influence in the election of an American president is something I deeply admire and commend him for achieving.",

          "context_type": "celebration_of_opponent's_achievement"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "compassion",
          "quote_text": "I applaud him for it, and offer him my sincere sympathy that his beloved grandmother did not live to see this day.",
          "confidence": 0.9,
          "context_type": "empathy"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "enmity",
          "quote_text": "Senator Obama and I have had and argued our differences, and he has prevailed.",

          "context_type": "acknowledgement_of_past_differences_without_hostility"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "amity",
          "quote_text": "I urge all Americans - I urge all Americans who supported me to join me in not just congratulating him, but offering our next president our good will and earnest effort to find ways to come together, to find the necessary compromises to bridge our differences and help restore our prosperity...",

          "context_type": "strong_call_for_cooperation"
        },
        {
          "dimension": "amity",
          "quote_text": "Whatever our differences, we are fellow Americans, and please believe me when I say no association has ever meant more to me than that.",

          "context_type": "affirmation_of_shared_identity"
        },
        {
